Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First I notice that each case has a sequence of events For example in Case A theres a retrieval of metal sheet scanning a barcode placing it aligning preheating picking up a welding tool welding measuring applying coating drying and checking Then in Case B similar events but with different parts

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Looking at the highlevel steps Material Preparation makes sense here The first few events are retrieving and placing the metal sheet which are part of preparing the raw material Then scanning and aligning preheating and placing the sheet on the table Then welding measuring applying coating drying and checking So that covers preparation then assembly welding inspection and quality control

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Wait but in the sample the first case ends with checking which is part of quality control So the highlevel steps would be Material Preparation Assembly Quality Inspection and Welding That makes sense

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: But wait the welding and checking are part of the process so maybe the steps should be more like Material Preparation planning and setting up Assembly welding Quality Inspection checking and then the final check

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I need to make sure each highlevel step is a coherent stage For example Material Preparation includes all the steps before assembly Assembly is welding steps Quality Inspection is checking Then the final step

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now for each step justifying why For Material Preparation because all the steps before assembly Assembly is welding steps Quality Inspection is checking Then the final step

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: So the answer would be to group into those steps and explain each Let me check the sample again In the first case the highlevel steps are Material Preparation Assembly Quality Inspection and Welding In the second case similar So thats consistent

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: I think thats it Now structure the output with the highlevel activities and justifications
